mapper.insert: insert into credit_loan_bill ( amount, operation_type, created_time, order_id, business_type, mobile) value(#{amount}, #{operationType}, #{createdTime}, #{orderId}, #{businessType}, #{mobile})
mapper.select: select IFNULL(SUM(amount),0) from credit_loan_bill where operation_type= 'IN' AND business_type= 'CREDIT_LOAN_REPAY'
select IFNULL(SUM(amount),0) from credit_loan_bill where operation_type= 'OUT' AND business_type= 'CREDIT_LOAN_TRANSFER_AGENT'
